{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Slow foot steps | class = HereticSoundSequence4 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1203 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence1</u>
Plays sound sequence number 3 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence4</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 3 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_SlowFootsteps environment 3 slot [[HereticAmbience]] playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb11 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb11 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb11 15 volumerel -2.36 playtime world/amb4 15 volumerel -2.36 playuntildone world/amb11 end
